duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform quality containment activities including sorting, inspecting, stocking, and moving products.
Read and interpret drawings, specifications, and use handheld gauges for quality inspections.
Review and expedite paperwork, as well as ensure timely closure of non-conformance issues from external providers.
Communicate effectively with internal and external team members.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
